description: From the darkness of her hidden stronghold, Rona Fauna built up a secret army and has now seized control of the Wormhole Driver, single-handedly throwing her people into chaos. Though she seems cool and detached as she puts her strange plans into motion, it`s easy to see that Rona is driven by some deep, powerful emotion... and she cannot rest until her task is at its end.
name: Rona Fauna
